rows.intro_text:
Whatever you are feeling today – we all benefit from taking a moment to pause.

When we are feeling stressed or if our children are making us feel very annoyed, we all need a moment to stop, to notice our thoughts and feelings and take a deep breath before we move on. 

We call this Taking a Pause.

intro_text.eng:
Whatever you are feeling today – we all benefit from taking a moment to pause.

When we are feeling stressed or if our children are making us feel very annoyed, we all need a moment to stop, to notice our thoughts and feelings and take a deep breath before we move on. 

We call this Taking a Pause.

audio_transcript.eng:
* Find a comfortable sitting position, your feet flat on the floor, your hands resting in your lap.
* Close your eyes if you feel comfortable.
* Ask yourself: what is my experience in this moment?
* Notice what thoughts you are experiencing. Notice if they are negative or positive. 
* Notice how you feel emotionally. Notice if your feelings are pleasant or unpleasant. 
* Notice how your body feels. Notice any discomfort or tension. 
* Bring your focus to your breath.
* You may want to place your hand on your stomach and feel it rise and fall with each breath.
* Follow your breath all the way in, how it pauses and how it exhales out.
* If you notice that you have started to think about something, this is completely natural.
* If you are noticing that you are feeling very stressed, you may want to reassure yourself by saying “It’s okay. Whatever it is, I am okay”.
* Then bring your awareness back to the feeling of your breath.
* Keep your focus on your own breath for a few moments.
* Allow your focus to expand to your whole body.
* Allow your focus to expand to the sounds in the room.
* Take a moment to reflect on whether you feel any different from before Taking a Pause.
* When you are ready, open your eyes.

outro_text.eng:
You can practice Taking a Pause at any moment in the day – especially when feeling stressed or when your child is frustrating you. It can even be for only 30 seconds or three short breaths!

Find more Take a Pause Activities in the App Library.
